description: Ms. codex. Title from fol. 1a. Physical description: 16 lines per page; written in naskh in black on glossy white European paper. Rubrication. Origin: Copy completed on 19 Jumādá I, 1267 H. by Abū Ṭālib ibn Aḥmad al-Mūsawī al-Khūnsārī (fol. 269a). Incip. of Sharḥ al-Wāfiyah: ... قوله قلت انکار التبادر اقول معنى کون التبادر Incip. of al-Wāfiyah: ... الحمد لله على جزىل آلائه ... و بعد فهذه رسالة وافىة
author: Riḍawī, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Bāqir
extent: 269 leaves : paper ; 204 x 129 mm. bound to 204 x 134 mm.
title: Ḥāshiyah-i
provenance: Owner's note on fol. 1a dated 1334 H. (1915-16).
creator: رضوي، محمد بن محمد باقر.
subject: Tūnī, ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muḥammad, -1660 or 1661—Wāfiyah
binding_note: Full leather binding (repaired) with stamped central mandorla, fleur de lis, and fillets.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
